ingredients: 1 pound extra-firm tofu 1/2 lime, Juice of 1 tablespoon ground cumin Salt to taste pinch of cayenne pepper 1 large red onion, thinly sliced 1/2 green bell pepper, cored, seeded and sliced 1/2 red bell pepper, cored, seeded and sliced 1 tablespoon expeller pressed canola or peanut oil, divided 4 large whole wheat, spelt or corn tortillas, warmed 1 avocado, peeled and diced 1/2 cup cilantro, chopped Salsa

1/2 lime, Juice of
1 tablespoon ground cumin
Salt to taste
pinch of cayenne pepper
